creator: spamik@yum.pl
text:
ipv6 https virtualhost speaks only plaina
apache 2.2.15 compliled with openssl-0.9.8o

<VirtualHost 171.63.62.57:443 [aa01:4f8:120:9481::20]:443>
SSLEngine On
,,,
</VirtualHost>

https://[aa01:4f8:120:9481::20]:443
ssl_error_rx_record_too_long

http://[aa01:4f8:120:9481::20]:443
yay it woks, but wait is a plain text :)

https://171.63.62.57:443
no problems here

creator: spamik@yum.pl
text:
besides, apache does not compile against openssl-1.0.0a

modules/ssl/.libs/libmod_ssl.a(ssl_engine_kernel.o): In function `ssl_callback_ServerNameIndication':
ssl_engine_kernel.c:(.text+0xc): undefined reference to `SSL_get_servername'
modules/ssl/.libs/libmod_ssl.a(ssl_engine_kernel.o): In function `ssl_find_vhost':
ssl_engine_kernel.c:(.text+0x27b): undefined reference to `SSL_set_SSL_CTX'
modules/ssl/.libs/libmod_ssl.a(ssl_engine_kernel.o): In function `ssl_hook_Fixup':
ssl_engine_kernel.c:(.text+0x116b): undefined reference to `SSL_get_servername'
modules/ssl/.libs/libmod_ssl.a(ssl_engine_kernel.o): In function `ssl_hook_ReadReq':
ssl_engine_kernel.c:(.text+0x257c): undefined reference to `SSL_get_servername'
modules/ssl/.libs/libmod_ssl.a(ssl_engine_vars.o): In function `ssl_var_lookup':
ssl_engine_vars.c:(.text+0x1690): undefined reference to `SSL_get_servername'
collect2: ld returned 1 exit status

creator: covener@gmail.com
text: Is there any sign your connecton was handled by that vhost (per-vhost log)?

creator: spamik@yum.pl
text:
yes, so it would seem. Earlier virtualhost

<VirtualHost 171.63.62.57 [aa01:4f8:120:9481::20]>

cought also [aa01:4f8:120:9481::20] on 443 port

chaning it to

<VirtualHost 171.63.62.57 [aa01:4f8:120:9481::20]:80>

resolves issue
